definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: Instead, the seasons result from Earth's tilt on its axis.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，季節的產生是因爲地球的斜軸。

sentences.english: The axis lies in any other direction the aspect is oblique .
sentences.chinese: 該軸位於其它方向，則稱爲斜軸。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between oblique astigmatism and refractive cyclophoria.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲證實斜軸散光會引起光學性旋轉隱斜。

sentences.english: The experience of water danger reclamation in synclinal axis illustrating at T312 working face is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了T312工作面向斜軸部水患治理的經驗。

sentences.english: The dominant joint system strikes roughly east, normal to the axis of La Veta Synclche.
sentences.chinese: 主要節理系大致爲東西走向，垂直於羅韋塔向斜軸。

sentences.english: In engineering, oblique axonometric drawing is useful.
sentences.chinese: 在工程圖中，斜軸測圖是很有用的。

sentences.english: Drawing software can not draw oblique axonometric drawing at the present.
sentences.chinese: 目前的繪圖軟件不能繪製斜軸測圖。

sentences.english: Thirdly, this variable intake device can adjust the constitution of the inclined-axis swirl efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 這種可變進氣結構可有效地調節斜軸渦流運動的組成。
